title: I really need help pls (PC RESTARTS)
body: So, when I get into the loading screen there's a black screen that comes up and then goes away then it comes up. Then my pc says "Your pc ran into a problem. We're just collecting some error info, and then we'll restart for you. I just got this problem recently and now I lost my LP and got a 20 min leaver buster for it. Does anyone know how to fix this please

replies.body: Oh that's pretty eerie.  :(  If your pc is restarting there could be a major driver or even hardware problem getting in the way.  Double check your air vents to make sure there's no overheating, then hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can help look into this with you directly and figure out what's going on.
